page.title: 13RECREATION EVENJOBB
page.content: WHIST DRIVES,DISCOS,PLAYS & CONCERTS ARE HELD IN THE AREA,RESIDENTS VISIT NEW RADNOR FOR BINGO,DARTS & SNOOKER. YOUNG PEOPLE BELONG TO RADNOR VALLEY YOUNG FARMERS' CLUB,SENIOR CITIZENS VISIT THE OVER 6O'S CLUB AT NEW RADNOR WOMEN BELONG TO EVANCOYD OR KINNERTON W.I.S,YOUNGSTERS JOIN THE 'WEDNESDAY CLUB' AT KINNERTON.SOCIAL EVENINGS SUCH AS DINNERS,COFFEE EVENINGS & NATIONAL CELEBRATIONS (SILVER JUBILEE ROYAL WEDDING,HARVEST THANKSGIVINGS, BONFIRE NIGHT) ARE ENJOYED BY EVERY- ONE. NEW RADNOR HAS A GARDENING CLUB WHICH SEVERAL PEOPLE VISIT. AGRICULT- URAL SHOWS ARE POPULAR,THE NEAREST HELD AT KINGTON, KNIGHTON,& THE ROYAL WELSH SHOW HELD AT BUILTH WELLS.
